review: Doctor is very calm and cool. Guide you and explains the cause and cure very nicely.  Listens very patiently and answer all your questions with a smile
Doctor Sharad was friendly and patient overall. He explained the condition  as well as the treatment process in a focused manner.  Happy with the overall experience. Highly recommended.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First, I booked the appointment for 7:15 pm and reached on time. But got to see the doc around 8 pm. 
I told him around 4 times I am having throat pain. He checked with a stethoscope and said I don't have a cold (but still I was spitting mucus, I don't know how). Thought I was complaining about throat pain, didn't check my throat. I didn't complain about Cough but prescribed me cough medicine along with a medicine to do gargle with.*** ** ***** **** ******* ****** ** ***** **** ********** ** *** ****** ******* ** ******* *** *** ****** ** **********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I had visited the doctor for fever. The doctor diagnosed it saying that I have congestion and throat infection and gave me antibiotics. ***** ******** ************ * ******* ******* ****** ** ** **** *** **** and went back to the doc. This time he was not ready to take any onus ** ****** **** ***** ***** ** ** ***** ** *** ********* ** **** *** ****** ************ When we pointed out that medicine can have a side effect of rashes ( which was clearly documented in the website of medicine manufacturer ), he got extremely rude and arrogant. *** **** ** ***** ********** *** ** **** ***** ****** *** ***** ** *************** I do not advise anyone to go to this doctor .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Even though the consultation with the doctor was good, but the bad part was the waiting period at the clinic. I had the first appointment at 10.00am, but doctor came around 11.20.  I had to wait 1 hr 20 minutes for the consultation. So the best thing is appointment should be given only based on the doctor's timings, whereas the appointments start from 10am. when I reached at 10 am, the clinic was almost empty except 2 patients waiting, even the receptionist arrived at 10.20 am, upon asking about the doctor's status she mentioned that doctor usually arrives after 10.30, do why does the appointments start at 10.This feedback is more for the clinic than the doctor. Hope the clinic management reads it and respect everyone's time. Please take the appointments based on doctor's availability and timings.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He has been my family doctor since last 3yrs. He is not just patient and friendly, he is so apt with correct diagnosis and treatment. I have noticed that the medicines that he prescribes are so effective at the same time mild. During lockdown, I was at my hometown in Ajmer, I was very sick. I was so pleased to find him consulting online. He even treated my aunt with arthritis that too remotely. She was bed ridden, we took her to so many doctors for so many years until Dr. Sharat treated her. She can now walk on her own, manage to climb stairs and even do some small household works. A huge thank you to doctor for making us well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sharat has been our family doctor for a very long time. He is well known for his polite attitude, humble nature and listening to his patiently very patiently. He will go deeper into understanding the root cause of the problems and would recommend dietary and lifestyle changes too, not just medication. He doesn't jump into prescribing medication and adds medicines very judicially. He has immense knowledge of the right methods including alternative and high tech methods of treatment and doesn't hesitate recommending what is good for the patient. It is always a delight to speak to him.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words and believing in me 😊🙏🏼

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We would like to share about Dr Sharat sir that he is very polite and very caring about his patients. My mother has hypertension and diabetic problems since 5 years and recently found arthritis and high CRP level, she is absolutely fine after taking his medicines. The most important thing which makes Dr Sharat different from other doctors is his caring nature about his patients,immediate response over chat and call, giving more time to patients to get them understand about their health issue and friendly nature. Before my mother, I visited doctors clinc for my food poisoning issue. Best Physician doctor in Bangalore. 

Thank you so much sir for your overall care and support to my family. 🙏🏻 Wishing you a Healthy and Happy life ahead.
